text: 10|54|Prthiraita yi ache seya yadi pratyeka yulumakarai byaktira hai yaya, tente si muktira binimayata se'ibora di diba arau anutapa gopana karaiba yetiya sihamte sasti pratyaksa karaiba. Tathapi'o sihamtara mimansa n'yayabhittika karaa haâ€™ba arau sihamtara prati kono an'yaya karaa nahaâ€™ba.
